Class CryptogramModel

java.util.Observable

  • Constructor Details

    • CryptogramModel

      public CryptogramModel()
      Constructs a CryptogramModel. Reads a random line from the quotes.txt file, initializes the answer, creates the encryption key, and sets the decryption key.

  • Method Details

    • setReplacement

      public void setReplacement(char encryptedChar, char replacementChar)
      Places the user's guess in the decryption key.
      Parameters:
      encryptedChar - the character in the encrypted string to replace
      replacementChar - the character the user wants to substitute

    • getEncryptedString

      public String getEncryptedString()
      Builds the encrypted string using the encryption key.
      Returns:
      the encrypted version of the answer

    • getDecryptedString

      public String getDecryptedString()
      Builds the decrypted string using the decryption key.
      Returns:
      the current decrypted version of the encrypted string

    • getAnswer

      public String getAnswer()
      Gets the answer string.
      Returns:
      the correct answer as a string
